verses.verse: Then Joseph <S%H3130><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not refrain <S%H662><s%> himself before all <S%H3605><s%> them that stood <S%H5324><s%> by him; and he cried, <S%H7121><s%> Cause every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> to go <S%H3318><s%> out from me. And there stood <S%H5975><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> with him, while Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made himself known <S%H3045><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>
And he wept <S%H5414><s%>( <S%H853><s%>) <S%H6963><s%> <S%H1065><s%> aloud: <S%H6963><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> heard. <S%H8085><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> I am Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> does my father <S%H1><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> live? <S%H2416><s%> And his brothers <S%H251><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not answer <S%H6030><s%> him; for they were troubled <S%H926><s%> at his presence. <S%H6440><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his brothers, <S%H251><s%> Come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you. And they came <S%H5066><s%> near. <S%H5066><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> I am Joseph <S%H3130><s%> your brother, <S%H251><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you sold <S%H4376><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore be not grieved, <S%H6087><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> angry <S%H2734><s%> with yourselves, <S%H5869><s%> that you sold <S%H4376><s%> me here: for God <S%H430><s%> did send <S%H7971><s%> me before <S%H6440><s%> you to preserve <S%H4241><s%> life.

For these <S%H2088><s%> two years <S%H8141><s%> has the famine <S%H7458><s%> been in the land: <S%H776><s%> and yet <S%H5750><s%> there are five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> in the which <S%H834><s%> there shall neither <S%H369><s%> be ripening <S%H2758><s%> nor harvest. <S%H7105><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me before <S%H6440><s%> you to preserve <S%H7760><s%> you a posterity <S%H7611><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and to save <S%H2421><s%> your lives <S%H2421><s%> by a great <S%H1419><s%> deliverance. <S%H6413><s%>

So now <S%H6258><s%> it was not you that sent <S%H7971><s%> me here, but God: <S%H430><s%> and he has made <S%H7760><s%> me a father <S%H1><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and lord <S%H113><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> his house, <S%H1004><s%> and a ruler <S%H4910><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Haste <S%H4116><s%> you, and go <S%H5927><s%> up to my father, <S%H1><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has made <S%H7760><s%> me lord <S%H113><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to me, tarry <S%H5975><s%> not:

And you shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> and you shall be near <S%H7138><s%> to me, you, and your children, <S%H1121><s%> and your children's <S%H1121><s%> children, <S%H1121><s%> and your flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and your herds, <S%H1241><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you have:

And there <S%H8033><s%> will I nourish <S%H3557><s%> you; for yet <S%H5750><s%> there are five <S%H2568><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> of famine; <S%H7458><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you, and your household, <S%H1004><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you have, come to poverty. <S%H3423><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> see, <S%H7200><s%> and the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of my brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> that it is my mouth <S%H6310><s%> that speaks <S%H1696><s%> to you.

And you shall tell <S%H5046><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> that you have seen; <S%H7200><s%> and you shall haste <S%H4116><s%> and bring <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> my father here.
And he fell <S%H5307><s%> on his brother <S%H251><s%> Benjamin's <S%H1144><s%> neck, <S%H6677><s%> and wept; <S%H1058><s%> and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> on his neck. <S%H6677><s%>
Moreover he kissed <S%H5401><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> on them: and after <S%H310><s%> that his brothers <S%H251><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with him.

And the fame <S%H6963><s%> thereof was heard <S%H8085><s%> in Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> brothers <S%H251><s%> are come: <S%H935><s%> and it pleased <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> well, and his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> to your brothers, <S%H251><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> you; lade <S%H2943><s%> your beasts, <S%H1165><s%> and go, <S%H3212><s%> get <S%H935><s%> you to the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%>

And take <S%H3947><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your households, <S%H1004><s%> and come <S%H935><s%> to me: and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the good <S%H2898><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

Now you are commanded, <S%H6680><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> you; take <S%H3947><s%> you wagons <S%H5699><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> for your little <S%H2945><s%> ones, and for your wives, <S%H802><s%> and bring <S%H5375><s%> your father, <S%H1><s%> and come. <S%H935><s%>
Also regard <S%H5869><s%> not your stuff; <S%H3627><s%> for the good <S%H2898><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> is your's.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so: <S%H3651><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them wagons, <S%H5699><s%> according <S%H5921><s%> to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them provision <S%H6720><s%> for the way. <S%H1870><s%>

To all <S%H3605><s%> of them he gave <S%H5414><s%> each man <S%H376><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of raiment; <S%H8071><s%> but to Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he gave <S%H5414><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> pieces of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> changes <S%H2487><s%> of raiment. <S%H8071><s%>

And to his father <S%H1><s%> he sent <S%H7971><s%> after this <S%H2063><s%> manner; ten <S%H6235><s%> asses <S%H2543><s%> laden <S%H5375><s%> with the good <S%H2898><s%> things of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> she asses <S%H860><s%> laden <S%H5375><s%> with corn <S%H1250><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> and meat <S%H4202><s%> for his father <S%H1><s%> by the way. <S%H1870><s%>
So he sent <S%H7971><s%> his brothers <S%H251><s%> away, and they departed: <S%H3212><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to them, See that you fall <S%H7264><s%> not out by the way. <S%H1870><s%>
And they went <S%H5927><s%> up out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father, <S%H1><s%>

And told <S%H5046><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is yet <S%H5750><s%> alive, <S%H2416><s%> and he is governor <S%H4910><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> And Jacob's heart <S%H3820><s%> fainted, <S%H6313><s%> for he believed <S%H539><s%> them not.

And they told <S%H1696><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had said <S%H1697><s%> to them: and when he saw <S%H7200><s%> the wagons <S%H5699><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> him, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> revived: <S%H2421><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> It is enough; <S%H7227><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> is yet <S%H5750><s%> alive: <S%H2416><s%> I will go <S%H3212><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> him before <S%H2962><s%> I die. <S%H4191><s%>
